# Breakdesigns Product Builder System Plugin

The Breakdesigns Product Builder (Virtuemart Extension) does not deliver the ability to group the configurated products in the cart.<br>
They are all shown as independant products as the user had added them manually.

This system plugin adds the ability to show them grouped together.<br>
Additionally the quantity-change and remove-from-cart options are forced to be disabled for the configurated products.<br>
The remove-from-cart function for the complete configuration is done with this plugin too.

<br>
